oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Idlewild and Madison - Correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: architecture; buildings; commercial properties; Idlewild Street; Madison Avenue; zoning;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter from Mrs. D. D. Saunders (by way of attorney John Vorder Bruegge) to the Board of Adjustment, requesting an appeal on an earlier application to build a commerical property on the southeast corner of Madison and Idlewild.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bruegge, John Vorder
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Josh Whitehead (Secretary, Board of Adjustment)
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Memphis and Shelby County Board of Adjustment
